SEARCH
Package com.example.haboob

Class OrganizerExpandableListsAdapter

java.lang.Object
android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter
com.example.haboob.OrganizerExpandableListsAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.ExpandableListAdapter, android.widget.HeterogeneousExpandableList
public class OrganizerExpandableListsAdapter extends android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter
OrganizerExpandableListsAdapter is a custom adapter used to populate an ExpandableListView with entrant data for a selected event.

It maps group headers (e.g., "Invited Entrants", "Waiting Entrants") to lists of entrant identifiers and manages how each group and child item is displayed in the expandable list UI.

    • OrganizerExpandableListsAdapter

      public OrganizerExpandableListsAdapter(android.content.Context mContext, ArrayList<String> expandableListTitles, HashMap<String,ArrayList<String>> expandableListDetail)
      Constructs an adapter to bind expandable list data to a view.
      Parameters:
      mContext - the current context (e.g., fragment or activity)
      expandableListTitles - list of group titles
      expandableListDetail - mapping from group title to its list of child entries
